00033 //: Define default values
00034 void mfpf_norm_corr2d_builder::set_defaults()
00035 {
00036   step_size_=1.0;
00037   ni_=7; nj_=7;
00038   ref_x_=0.5*(ni_-1);
00039   ref_y_=0.5*(nj_-1);
00040   search_ni_=5;
00041   search_nj_=5;
00042   nA_=0;
00043   dA_=0.0;
00044   overlap_f_=1.0;
00045 }

00061 void mfpf_norm_corr2d_builder::set_kernel_size(unsigned ni, unsigned nj,

00066   ref_y_=ref_y;

00069 void mfpf_norm_corr2d_builder::set_kernel_size(unsigned ni, unsigned nj)
00070 {
00071   ni_=ni; nj_=nj;
00072   ref_x_=0.5*(ni_-1);
00073   ref_y_=0.5*(nj_-1);
00074 }
00075 
00076 //: Define region size in world co-ordinates
00077 //  Sets up ROI to cover given box (with samples at step_size()),
00078 //  with ref point at centre.
00079 void mfpf_norm_corr2d_builder::set_region_size(double wi, double wj)
00080 {
00081   wi/=step_size();
00082   wj/=step_size();
00083   int ni = vcl_max(1,int(0.99+wi));
00084   int nj = vcl_max(1,int(0.99+wj));
00085   set_kernel_size(unsigned(ni),unsigned(nj));
00086 }
00087 
00088 //: Number of dimensions in the model
00089 unsigned mfpf_norm_corr2d_builder::model_dim()
00090 {
00091   return ni_*nj_;
00092 }

00095 //: Initialise building
00096 // Must be called before any calls to add_example(...)
00097 void mfpf_norm_corr2d_builder::clear(unsigned n_egs)
00098 {
00099   n_added_=0;
00100 }
00101 
00102 static void normalize(vil_image_view<double>& im)
00103 {
00104   unsigned ni=im.ni(),nj=im.nj();
00105   double sum=0.0,ss=0.0;
00106   for (unsigned j=0;j<nj;++j)
00107     for (unsigned i=0;i<ni;++i)
00108     {
00109       sum+=im(i,j); ss+=im(i,j)*im(i,j);
00110     }
00111 
00112   assert(!vnl_math_isnan(sum));
00113 
00114   if (ss<1e-6)
00115   {
00116     vcl_cerr<<"Warning: Almost flat region in mfpf_norm_corr2d_builder\n"
00117             <<"         Size: "<<ni<<" x "<<nj<<vcl_endl;
00118   }
00119 
00120   // Normalise so that im has zero mean and unit sum of squares.
00121   double mean=sum/(ni*nj);
00122   ss-=(mean*mean*ni*nj);
00123   double s=1.0;
00124   if (ss>0) s = vcl_sqrt(1.0/ss);
00125   vil_math_scale_and_offset_values(im,s,-s*mean);
00126 }
00127 
00128 //: Add one example to the model
00129 void mfpf_norm_corr2d_builder::add_one_example(const vimt_image_2d_of<float>& image,
00130                                                const vgl_point_2d<double>& p,
00131                                                const vgl_vector_2d<double>& u)
00132 {
00133   assert(image.image().size()>0);
00134 
00135   vgl_vector_2d<double> u1=step_size_*u;
00136   vgl_vector_2d<double> v1(-u1.y(),u1.x());
00137 
00138   vil_image_view<double> sample;
00139 
00140   const vgl_point_2d<double> p0 = p-ref_x_*u1-ref_y_*v1;
00141 
00142   const vimt_transform_2d& s_w2i = image.world2im();
00143   vgl_point_2d<double> im_p0 = s_w2i(p0);
00144   vgl_vector_2d<double> im_u = s_w2i.delta(p0, u1);
00145   vgl_vector_2d<double> im_v = s_w2i.delta(p0, v1);
00146 
00147   vil_resample_bilin(image.image(),sample,
00148                      im_p0.x(),im_p0.y(),  im_u.x(),im_u.y(),
00149                      im_v.x(),im_v.y(),ni_,nj_);
00150   normalize(sample);
00151 
00152   if (n_added_==0) sum_.deep_copy(sample);
00153   else             vil_math_add_image_fraction(sum_,1.0,sample,1.0);
00154   n_added_++;
00155 }
00156 
00157 //: Get sample of region around specified point in image
00158 void mfpf_norm_corr2d_builder::get_sample_vector(const vimt_image_2d_of<float>& image,
00159                                                  const vgl_point_2d<double>& p,
00160                                                  const vgl_vector_2d<double>& u,
00161                                                  vcl_vector<double>& v)
00162 {
00163   assert(image.image().size()>0);
00164 
00165   vgl_vector_2d<double> u1=step_size_*u;
00166   vgl_vector_2d<double> v1(-u1.y(),u1.x());
00167 
00168   const vgl_point_2d<double> p0 = p-ref_x_*u1-ref_y_*v1;
00169 
00170   const vimt_transform_2d& s_w2i = image.world2im();
00171   vgl_point_2d<double> im_p0 = s_w2i(p0);
00172   vgl_vector_2d<double> im_u = s_w2i.delta(p0, u1);
00173   vgl_vector_2d<double> im_v = s_w2i.delta(p0, v1);
00174 
00175   vil_image_view<double> sample;
00176   vil_resample_bilin(image.image(),sample,
00177                      im_p0.x(),im_p0.y(),  im_u.x(),im_u.y(),
00178                      im_v.x(),im_v.y(),ni_,nj_);
00179   normalize( sample );
00180 
00181   v.resize( sample.ni()*sample.nj() );
00182   unsigned v_ind=0;
00183   for (unsigned j=0;j<sample.nj();j++)
00184   {
00185     for (unsigned i=0;i<sample.ni();i++,v_ind++)
00186     {
00187       v[v_ind] = sample(i,j);
00188     }
00189   }
00190 }
00191 
00192 //: Add one example to the model
00193 void mfpf_norm_corr2d_builder::add_example(const vimt_image_2d_of<float>& image,
00194                                            const vgl_point_2d<double>& p,
00195                                            const vgl_vector_2d<double>& u)
00196 {
00197   if (nA_==0)
00198   {
00199     add_one_example(image,p,u);
00200     return;
00201   }
00202 
00203   vgl_vector_2d<double> v(-u.y(),u.x());
00204   for (int iA=-int(nA_);iA<=(int)nA_;++iA)
00205   {
00206     double A = iA*dA_;
00207     vgl_vector_2d<double> uA = u*vcl_cos(A)+v*vcl_sin(A);
00208     add_one_example(image,p,uA);
00209   }
00210 }
00211 
00212 //: Build this object from the data supplied in add_example()
00213 void mfpf_norm_corr2d_builder::build(mfpf_point_finder& pf)
00214 {
00215   assert(n_added_>0);
00216   assert(pf.is_a()=="mfpf_norm_corr2d");
00217   mfpf_norm_corr2d& nc = static_cast<mfpf_norm_corr2d&>(pf);
00218   vil_image_view<double> mean;
00219   mean.deep_copy(sum_);
00220   vil_math_scale_values(mean,1.0/n_added_);
00221   normalize(mean);
00222   nc.set(mean,ref_x_,ref_y_);
00223   set_base_parameters(nc);
00224   nc.set_overlap_f(overlap_f_);
00225 }
00226 
00227 //=======================================================================
00228 // Method: set_from_stream
00229 //=======================================================================
00230 //: Initialise from a string stream
00231 bool mfpf_norm_corr2d_builder::set_from_stream(vcl_istream &is)
00232 {
00233   // Cycle through string and produce a map of properties
00234   vcl_string s = mbl_parse_block(is);
00235   vcl_istringstream ss(s);
00236   mbl_read_props_type props = mbl_read_props_ws(ss);
00237 
00238   set_defaults();
00239 
00240   // Extract the properties
00241   parse_base_props(props);
00242 
00243   if (props.find("ni")!=props.end())
00244   {
00245     ni_=vul_string_atoi(props["ni"]);
00246     props.erase("ni");
00247   }
00248   if (props.find("nj")!=props.end())
00249   {
00250     nj_=vul_string_atoi(props["nj"]);
00251     props.erase("nj");
00252   }
00253 
00254   overlap_f_=vul_string_atof(props.get_optional_property("overlap_f", "1.0"));
00255 
00256   if (props.find("ref_x")!=props.end())
00257   {
00258     ref_x_=vul_string_atof(props["ref_x"]);
00259     props.erase("ref_x");
00260   }
00261   else ref_x_=0.5*(ni_-1.0);
00262 
00263   if (props.find("ref_y")!=props.end())
00264   {
00265     ref_y_=vul_string_atof(props["ref_y"]);
00266     props.erase("ref_y");
00267   }
00268   else ref_y_=0.5*(nj_-1.0);
00269 
00270   if (props.find("nA")!=props.end())
00271   {
00272     nA_=vul_string_atoi(props["nA"]);
00273     props.erase("nA");
00274   }
00275 
00276   if (props.find("dA")!=props.end())
00277   {
00278     dA_=vul_string_atof(props["dA"]);
00279     props.erase("dA");
00280   }
00281 
00282   // Check for unused props
00283   mbl_read_props_look_for_unused_props(
00284       "mfpf_norm_corr2d_builder::set_from_stream", props, mbl_read_props_type());
00285   return true;
00286 }

00307 void mfpf_norm_corr2d_builder::print_summary(vcl_ostream& os) const
00308 {
00309   os << "{ size: " << ni_ << 'x' << nj_
00310      << " nA: " << nA_ << " dA: " << dA_ <<' ';
00311   mfpf_point_finder_builder::print_summary(os);

00313      << " }";

00316 //: Version number for I/O
00317 short mfpf_norm_corr2d_builder::version_no() const
00318 {
00319   return 2;
00320 }
00321 
00322 void mfpf_norm_corr2d_builder::b_write(vsl_b_ostream& bfs) const
00323 {
00324   vsl_b_write(bfs,version_no());
00325   mfpf_point_finder_builder::b_write(bfs);  // Save base class
00326   vsl_b_write(bfs,ni_);
00327   vsl_b_write(bfs,nj_);
00328   vsl_b_write(bfs,ref_x_);
00329   vsl_b_write(bfs,ref_y_);
00330   vsl_b_write(bfs,nA_);
00331   vsl_b_write(bfs,dA_);
00332   vsl_b_write(bfs,sum_);
00333   vsl_b_write(bfs,n_added_);
00334   vsl_b_write(bfs,overlap_f_);
00335 }
00336 
00337 //=======================================================================
00338 // Method: load
00339 //=======================================================================
00340 
00341 void mfpf_norm_corr2d_builder::b_read(vsl_b_istream& bfs)
00342 {
00343   if (!bfs) return;
00344   short version;
00345   vsl_b_read(bfs,version);
00346   switch (version)
00347   {
00348     case (1):
00349     case (2):
00350       mfpf_point_finder_builder::b_read(bfs);  // Load base class
00351       vsl_b_read(bfs,ni_);
00352       vsl_b_read(bfs,nj_);
00353       vsl_b_read(bfs,ref_x_);
00354       vsl_b_read(bfs,ref_y_);
00355       vsl_b_read(bfs,nA_);
00356       vsl_b_read(bfs,dA_);
00357       vsl_b_read(bfs,sum_);
00358       vsl_b_read(bfs,n_added_);
00359       if (version==1) overlap_f_=1.0;
00360       else            vsl_b_read(bfs,overlap_f_);
00361       break;
00362     default:
00363       vcl_cerr << "I/O ERROR: vsl_b_read(vsl_b_istream&)\n"
00364                << "           Unknown version number "<< version << vcl_endl;
00365       bfs.is().clear(vcl_ios::badbit); // Set an unrecoverable IO error on stream
00366       return;
00367   }
00368 }
